title: Binance US becomes the 14th crypto exchange to announce the suspension of XRP trading
excerpt: On Wednesday, December 30, Binance US became the latest cryptocurrency exchange to announce that United States customers will not be able to buy or sell XRP effective January 13th, 2021.
author: News Desk

title: Binance could be behind over a dozen stake pools on the Cardano blockchain
excerpt: Binance, one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges, might be behind around a dozen stake pools on the Cardano network.
author: Priyeshu Garg

title: Binance Futures surpasses BitMEX, becomes most liquid Bitcoin perpetual swap
excerpt: According to the data from Skew, Binance Futures now has the most liquid Bitcoin perpetual swap contract.
author: Joseph Young

title: Tellor (TRB) secures coveted Binance listing as oracle bull run continues
excerpt: The DeFi sector’s massive growth in recent weeks has given rise to other fragments of the crypto market, with decentralized finance’s reliance on oracles driving investor demand to these types of projects.
author: Cole Petersen

title: The CEO of Band Protocol on integrating with Binance’s Smart Chain, profitability, and future plans
excerpt: Integrating Band Protocol’s oracle with Binance Smart Chain has opened a new door for the DeFi industry.
author: Priyeshu Garg

title: Binance system traffic has surpassed its 2017 highs as crypto bull market kicks off
excerpt: The crypto market appears to be entering a full-fledged bull run, with Bitcoin and other major altcoins slowly advancing higher while smaller market-cap coins see parabolic momentum.
author: Cole Petersen

title: Binance announces Yearn.finance listing; YFI price rockets to fresh highs
excerpt: Yearn.finance has been seeing tremendous growth in recent times, with the total value locked (TVL) within the protocol reaching $150m while the YFI token price sees significant organic growth.
author: Cole Petersen

title: Binance, Bitfinex, OKEx list DOGE derivatives after meme-coin volume jumps 683%
excerpt: Three of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges listed Dogecoin earlier today after the meme-currency jumped 50 percent in two days.

title: Binance CEO has an explanation for a possible TikTok-driven altseason
excerpt: Cryptocurrencies are not the first thing on one’s mind when they hear about TikTok.
author: Shaurya Malwa

title: Binance Research to reinvent site, integrating new crypto data tools from IntoTheBlock
excerpt: Binance Research – the analytics division of cryptocurrency exchange Binance – is moving to reinvent their website, partnering with the Miami-based data visualization platform IntoTheBlock (ITB) to offer the crypto market with deep insights into on-chain data.
author: Cole Petersen

title: What the implications of Binance’s acquisition of CoinMarketCap mean for crypto security
excerpt: While global markets have been hit with panic facing some of the worst challenges since the financial crisis of 2008, the crypto industry has solidified its power through one of the largest crypto mergers to date.
author: Samuel Bocetta

title: Beware: Coinbase, Binance, Bitcoin.com, MyCelium among Android apps threatened by new EventBot malware
excerpt: Security research company Cybereason has discovered a new type of Android trojan that has been targeting banking and money transfer apps.
author: Priyeshu Garg

title: Binance sets foot in the mining sector with new PoW and PoS mining pool
excerpt: The world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, Binance, announced the official launch of its mining pool service. Dubbed Binance Pool, it will offer support for both Proof-of-Work (PoW) and Proof-of-Stake (PoS) mining mechanisms.
author: Ali Martinez

title: After burning 10% of its supply, here’s where Binance Coin could be headed next
excerpt: Binance recently announced that it conducted its 11th quarterly token burn totaling $52.5 million worth of its native crypto, Binance Coin.
author: Ali Martinez

title: One chart shows how Binance grew so shockingly fast in crypto since 2018
excerpt: Researchers at Glassnode conducted an in-depth research of the on-chain data of Binance, one of the world’s largest crypto exchanges, comparing its growth with other trading platforms.
author: Joseph Young

title: Why this cryptocurrency just surged 16% on news of a key Binance partnership
excerpt: Basic Attention Token (BAT), the native cryptocurrency of the Brave Browser, spiked by more than 16 percent following a Binance trading widget integration.
author: Joseph Young

title: Binance CEO explains the real reason why the crypto market crashed last week
excerpt: The crypto market saw one of its largest single-day downwards movement last Thursday, with Bitcoin leading a massive selloff that sent the benchmark digital asset reeling to lows of $3,800, subsequently causing most major altcoins to also crater lower.
author: Cole Petersen

title: In times of uncertainty and fear, Binance goes long on India
excerpt: Binance has partnered with cryptocurrency exchange WazirX to create a “Blockchain for India” fund worth $50 million.
author: Priyeshu Garg

title: Binance stablecoin’s exponential growth shows crypto investors are flocking for safety
excerpt: Binance’s BUSD has become the fifth largest stablecoin by market capitalization, as investors flock to stablecoins for safety amidst extreme volatility in both the crypto and global financial market.

title: Binance.US introduces a more aggressive referral program
excerpt: Binance US, the United States only arm of Binance, has introduced a new referral program for its platform.

title: Planning for the worst: Binance donates to fight Coronavirus, Coinbase reveals plan for remote work
excerpt: The approach that cryptocurrency exchanges Binance and Coinbase are taking to the coronavirus is as different as night and day.

title: OKEx launches a decentralized exchange and the OKChain Testnet; can it compete with Binance?
excerpt: OKEx announced the launch of its own blockchain and a decentralized exchange.

title: Chainalysis says Binance and Huobi allegedly used for billions of dollars in criminal Bitcoin activity

title: Founders of Tron and Binance get their accounts removed from Weibo [UPDATED]

title: Big traders on Binance panic tanking Matic’s price by almost 75%
excerpt: The digital token of Ethereum-based payments company Matic lost almost 75 percent of its value in a matter of minutes after two weeks of massive appreciation.

title: Are you dedicated enough to get a tattoo of your company’s logo? Binance’s Changpeng Zhao is
excerpt: A true measure of an entrepreneur’s dedication to his project isn’t the hours he puts in or the sacrifices he makes, but his willingness to have the logo of his company forever embedded on his arm.
author: Priyeshu Garg

title: Data shows Binance Coin’s bullish sentiment is on the rise, can it translate to price?
excerpt: According to the LunarCRUSH research team, social activity and bullish sentiment around Binance Coin (BNB) have risen to six-month highs.

title: TV report in China says Binance’s Shanghai “office” was actually a call center
excerpt: According to Dovey Wan, a founding partner at Primitive Ventures, a local TV station in Shanghai reported that the “office” of Binance in Shanghai was a call center operated by Babi Finance.
author: News Desk

title: Binance CEO to sue The Block over alleged fake Shanghai police raid story
excerpt: On November 21, crypto industry publication The Block released a story entitled “Binance’s Shanghai office shut down following police raid, sources say.” The article quickly blew up on Twitter, with some going as far as to suggest that it contributed to the recent collapse of the Bitcoin price, which now sits at $7,250 as of […]
author: News Desk

title: Binance Coin (BNB) utility is growing exponentially and its price may follow
excerpt: The following analysis will explore how the number one utility token in the cryptocurrency industry, Binance Coin (BNB), is providing value to its users and the impact that this could have on its market value.

title: Crypto exchange legalization in China is not true says Binance CEO
excerpt: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao has clarified that rumors circulating about the “legalization” of crypto exchanges is simply misleading.

title: Binance.US to list its 21st cryptocurrency, Waves
excerpt: Binance US, the US-based arm of crypto exchange giant Binance, has continued its aggressive listing policy announcing it will be adding support for the native token of the Waves smart contract platform, WAVES, on the 29th of October.  According to a blog post by the San Francisco-registered firm, users can now start depositing Waves on Binance US […]

title: Binance.US surpasses $10 million in daily trading volume, less than one month after launch

title: Binance Exec: Bitcoin futures volume rose significantly in 2019, as it raises leverage to 125x
excerpt: Speaking to CryptoSlate in an exclusive interview, Binance Futures Director Aaron Gong said that the Bitcoin futures volume in 2019 increased significantly, expressing confidence in the long term trend of the market.

title: Binance.US opens account deposits in preparation for trading, adds BNB

title: Binance leads investment round in Chinese crypto-data website Mars Finance at $200m valuation
excerpt: Binance made a strategic investment in crypto-data website Mars Finance.

title: Wei Zhou, CFO of Binance: “We want the institutions to come in” [INTERVIEW]

title: BitMEX CEO responds to Binance’s market maker slip up, offers CZ a “copy/paste” course

title: BNB plunges 10% after Binance admits to data hack

title: Earn up to 15% interest on BNB, Tether, and Ethereum Classic on Binance
excerpt: Binance announced the launch of a lending platform, offering up to 15 percent annualized interest rate for 14-day fixed-term BNB, USDT, and ETC based instruments.

title: Are Coinbase and IDEX teaming up to take on Binance in the US?
excerpt: Top crypto exchange Coinbase has added support for IDEX on its official wallet, allowing its customers to trade hundreds of new cryptocurrencies on the third-party “hybrid decentralized” exchange.
